special:
The problem can be corrected by updating your system to the following package versions:
In general, a standard system update will make all the necessary changes.
threat: A remote attacker could use this flaw to cause a  denial of service, or possibly obtain login access with a different users  username.
A local  attacker could use this flaw to read certain arbitrary files, and access  other sensitive information.
A local attacker  could use this flaw to possibly gain privileges.
A local attacker could use this flaw to delete certain unintended  files.
A local attacker could use this flaw to cause a  denial of service.
